definition[0]: if someone or something is insured, there is insurance relating to them
example[1]: I’m not insured to drive Anne’s car.
definition[1]: used in insurance contracts to talk about the person, organization etc that is insured
example[2]: This section also covers cancellation of a holiday where the insured decides to cancel.
example[3]: The Swiss remain the world’s most insured people, outspending Japanese and Americans on premiums.
example[4]: There were few pilots at that time who were insured to undertake such a flight.
example[5]: We insist that you are insured against accidents.
